com.android.gis

类 Buffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.gis.Buffer

  • public class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object
    缓冲区分析
    缓冲区分析类可以创建对象缓冲区

    • 方法详细资料

      • CreateBuffer

        public static GeoRegion CreateBuffer(Geometry geometry,
                     double dBufferRadius)
        创建对象缓冲区
        参数:
        geometry - 待创建缓冲区的对象
        dBufferRadius - 缓冲区半径
        返回:
        返回创建后缓冲区对象
        示例代码:
          Point2D p2D = new Point2D();
          p2D = mapView.getCenter();
          GeoPoint geoPoint = new GeoPoint();
          geoPoint.make(p2D.x,p2D.y);
          GeoRegion gRegion = new GeoRegion();
          gRegion = Buffer.CreateBuffer(geoPoint,2.0);
